00022 #pragma once
00023 
00030 #include <l4/sys/types.h>
00031 #include <l4/sys/linkage.h>
00032 #include <l4/sys/task.h>
00033 
00034 EXTERN_C_BEGIN
00035 
00043 L4_CV L4_INLINE
00044 l4_msgtag_t
00045 l4re_util_cap_release(l4_cap_idx_t cap);
00046 
00047 /* Implementations */
00048 
00049 L4_CV L4_INLINE
00050 l4_msgtag_t
00051 l4re_util_cap_release(l4_cap_idx_t cap)
00052 {
00053   return l4_task_unmap(L4_BASE_TASK_CAP,
00054                        l4_obj_fpage(cap, 0, L4_FPAGE_RWX),
00055                        L4_FP_ALL_SPACES);
00056 }
00057 
00058 EXTERN_C_END
